channel.title: Feedbacks & Suggestions
channel.description: You can give feedback here, ask any query or suggest any idea to support forum

item.title: Official { Telegram } Group of DigitalJanta
item.author: invalid@example.com (wmnitin)
item.dc:creator: wmnitin
item.content:encoded:
Hi Members,

No more different individual whatsapp groups now, DJ is now having one official group for chatting & instant help on Telegram app.

Feel free to join & start your discussion on tips & tricks. I am also online there in case of forum related help.

CLICK HERE TO JOIN GROUP NOW​

Do not spam in group, Do not use external links.

Thanks,
Admin

item.title: Ask forum related HELP & Queries here
item.author: invalid@example.com (wmnitin)
item.dc:creator: wmnitin
item.content:encoded:
Hello Members,

Now no need to personal message to staffs for account related problems or queries.

Just post your queries in this thread & we will reply you for sure.

"Do not ask for any trick etc here otherwise you may get warning"

This thread is only for Forum queries like account problem, pro active problem etc

Thanks. !!! Enjoy DigitalJanta

item.title: How to find your Threads & Posts
item.author: invalid@example.com (wmnitin)
item.dc:creator: wmnitin
item.content:encoded:
i DJ members, I see a lot of members are having trouble in finding their threads & posts that they have pasted till now.
Follow these steps to see your content:

1. Goto your profile first.


2. Goto Information tab then


3. There you will find links to access your content.

To check your post counts of last 60 days, click on "find all content" & manually count your posts from there....

That's all

item.title: Create logo & get PayTm money - DigitalJanta
item.author: invalid@example.com (wmnitin)
item.dc:creator: wmnitin
item.content:encoded:
Hello DJ people,

I know many people over here are talented, someone is h@cker, someone is designer, someone is doing video editing, etc etc.

Today, we are looking for some cool designers to create new DigitalJanta logo. Any size.

--- Logo should be made using photoshop as I need PSD file also.
--- Logo can be of yours choice but it should look unique.
--- Don't just use some icon & text, should be creative

Price: 200 Rs via PayTM.

Anyone can create & take part, I will select one...

Create logo & get PayTm money - DigitalJanta

item.title: Becoming Proactive is now very easy
item.author: invalid@example.com (wmnitin)
item.dc:creator: wmnitin
item.content:encoded:
Hi DJ members, As more than 60% members has become proactive, congrats to them for getting this feature for free.

Proactive benefits
  • Proactive members can only use PM.
  • Proactive members can use shoutbox.
  • proactive members can see all Hide/Pro code.
  • If you will receive any warning, your proactive will be lost [will be applicable from next week]
  • Can use Signature.
  • Proactive banner.
  • New premium username color.
  • Many special permissions of forum.
Our...

Becoming Proactive is now very easy

item.title: Introducing PRO Tag
item.author: invalid@example.com (wmnitin)
item.dc:creator: wmnitin
item.content:encoded:
Hello Members, As you remember last time we have announced PROACTIVE membership for members who are active in this forum.
Read if you don't know =>http://www.digitaljanta.in/community/proactive/

What is PRO tag:
PRO is same like old HIDE tag, you use use it to hide content between posts. Old HIDE code is going to be replaced soon.

Features of HIDE tag :
1. PRO codes will be visible to only proactive members.
2. Anyone can use PRO tag in his thread /...

Introducing PRO Tag

item.title: ShoutBox Security !
item.author: invalid@example.com (KRATO$)
item.dc:creator: KRATO$
item.content:encoded:
hey DJ ;
I'd like to concern that don't you feel Somehow our Shoutbox is Insecure .
itz an Platform for Online Discussion as well as many members can participate in it but, as only members can participate in it , won't it would be better if it'll be kept hidden for the GUEST Users.
Many discussions / Problem are solved there itself which are clearly visible for all.
If only members can participate in SHOUTBOX then it should be visible upto them.
please suggest your Opinion about it.
Thanks !

item.title: Can you please remove the time between reply on members that have say 2 stars
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hamster24)
item.dc:creator: Hamster24
item.content:encoded:
It is very annoying to get a message saying you have to wait 47 seconds before posting again when i am not a spammer. Can you please make it so that once a person posts say 20 posts this time limit is removed.

Thank YOu
